title: Neve Campbell
summary: Neve Adrianne Campbell (/ˈnɛv ˈkæmbəl/; born October 3, 1973) is a Canadian actress, who is an influential figure in popular culture, particularly for her work in the drama and horror genres. Campbell is regarded as a sex symbol of the 1990s,[1][2] appearing on People magazine's list of "50 Most Beautiful People" twice.
